name: LanguagePicker
0:
”Alexa, open Language Picker”
”My favorite language is Java”
”What is my favorite language?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: language picker
des: Show your pride and share your favorite programming language with Alexa. When you are ready to share it with others (or just need a reminder) ask Language Picker what your favorite language is.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
